name: Deep Wormhole
description:
This game is the first game of Le Basement. We are a student team and this project was to make a game in one week. The challenge was to create our first game in 3D for all of us and made a little game with simple gameplay and simple graphism.

PS : "Grappling" is the first name for our game but it didn't work well so we changed, that's why zip file called "Grappling".
